sentences.en: Air leakage to the float bowl could result in imbalance of the carburetor.
sentences.cn: 空气漏入浮子室中,会使化油器不稳定.

sentences.en: An imbalance in certain chemicals leads to disturbances in the brain's function.
sentences.cn: 某些化学成分失衡会道致大脑功能的紊乱.

sentences.en: Diagonal lines usually convey a sense of movement or imbalance.
sentences.cn: 斜线往往传达一种运动或不平衡.

sentences.en: Fortunately, physicians have pills to correct hormone imbalance.
sentences.cn: 幸好, 医生备有可纠正激素失衡的药丸.

sentences.en: Increased recruitment of women engineers will help correct the gender imbalance in the profession.
sentences.cn: 多聘请女工程师有助于平衡这一职业中存在的性别失衡.

sentences.en: It is simply an imbalance of pain versus coping resources.
sentences.cn: 它仅是痛苦指数和因应资源的不平衡.

sentences.en: Movement of matter from hot regions to cooler ones will tend to decrease the thermal imbalance.
sentences.cn: 物质从热区转移至冷区有助于减少热失衡现象.

sentences.en: Objective To analysis the acid - base imbalance of serious pulmonary tuberculosis with infection.
sentences.cn: 目的分析重症肺结核继发感染的酸碱失衡情况.

sentences.en: Take the problems of our trade imbalance for example.
sentences.cn: 以解决两国贸易不平衡为例.

sentences.en: The alarm system has the over - speed , over - temp, imbalance and belt - broken alarm function.
sentences.cn: 具有过速 、 过温 、 失衡等报警及保护功能.

sentences.en: The current trade deficit indicates a serious imbalance between our import and export trade.
sentences.cn: 当前的贸易赤字表明我们的进出口贸易严重失调.

sentences.en: The illness is triggered by a chemical imbalance in the brain.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病是大脑化学物质失衡诱发的。

sentences.en: The more likely explanation can be found in the enormous imbalance in world income distribution.
sentences.cn: 世界收入分配的巨大的不平衡状况似乎是更为可信的解释.

sentences.en: Trade imbalance with different partners became imminent when the trade surplus soared.
sentences.cn: 一是外贸顺差大幅增加,国别贸易不平衡更为突出.

sentences.en: When more males are born than females, there is a population imbalance.
sentences.cn: 当男性出生得比女性多时, 就会造成人口中的男女比例失调.

trans.tran_en: a lack of a fair or correct balance between two things, which results in problems or unfairness
